categories.relax_description: Projects with basic entry capital suitable for all types of investors
categories.exclusive_description: Projects with higher-than-average initial capital and interest
categories.elite_description: Projects with very high initial capital and interest and suitable for experienced investors

labels.MONTH_description: Interest is paid on a monthly basis
labels.FOURMONTHS_description: Interest is paid on a quarterly basis
labels.SEMESTER_description: Interest is paid on a semi-annual basis
labels.YEAR_description: Interest is paid on an annual basis
labels.END_description: Interest is paid at the same time the principal is repaid
labels.SHORT_description: Project duration is less than or equal to 10 months
labels.HALF_description: Project duration is between 11 and 14 months
labels.LONG_description: Project duration is greater than or equal to 15 months
labels.ALTERNATIVE_description: Projects derived from underlying real estate
labels.ECO_description: Projects with particular characteristics of environmental sustainability
labels.SPORTIVE_description: Projects with underlying property for sports use
